src: Daha önce diyabetik olup şimdi diyabetik olmayan 4 aylık farelerimiz var, diye ekledi.
mt: 4-month-old diabetic mice that are no longer diabetic, he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Halifax, Nova Scotia'daki Dalhousie Üniversitesi'nde tıp profesörü ve Kanada Diyabet Derneği'nin klinik ve bilim alanı başkanı olan Dr. Ehud Ur, çalışmanın henüz başlangıç aşamasında olduğu konusunda uyarıda bulundu.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chair of the clinical and science area of the Canadian Diabetes Association, cautioned that the study is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Bazı diğer uzmanlar gibi o da, bu bulguların zaten Tip 1 diyabeti olan kişilerle bir ilişkisi olmadığına dikkat çekerek diyabetin tedavi edilebileceği ile ilgili şüpheci kalmıştır.
mt: Like other experts, he also pointed out that these findings do not appear to be related to Type 1 diabetes and remains skeptical about curing diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: İsveç Akademisi Nobel Edebiyat Komitesi'nin daimi sekreteri Sara Danius, İsveç'teki Sveriges Radyosu'ndaki bir radyo programında, komitenin 2016 Nobel Edebiyat Ödülü'nü kazanma konusunda Bob Dylan'a doğrudan ulaşamadığını, ona ulaşma çabalarından vazgeçtiğini duyurdu.
mt: 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature Committee Secretary Sara Danius announced on Swedish Radio that the committee had been unable to directly contact Bob Dylan about the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, and had given up trying.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius dedi ki, "Şu anda hiçbir şey yapmıyoruz. En yakın iş ortağını aradım ve e-postalar yolladım, çok samimi cevaplar aldım. Şu an için bu ziyadesiyle kafi."
mt: Danius said, "We're not doing anything right now. I reached out to our closest partner and sent emails, I got very friendly responses. For now, this is more than enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Daha önce, Ring'in CEO'su Jamie Siminoff şirketin, garajındaki dükkanından kapı zilinin duyulmadığı zamanlarda başladığını belirtmişti.
mt: Previously, Ring's CEO Jamie Siminoff had said the company started in his garage when his doorbell wasn't working.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: WiFi ile çalışan bir kapı zili yaptığını söyledi.
mt: He said he made a doorbell that works with WiFi.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff, programdaki jürilerin başlangıç fonu sağlamayı reddettiği, 2013 yılında katıldığı Shark Tank bölümünün ardından satışların arttığını söyledi.
mt: 2013, Siminoff said sales increased after appearing on the Shark Tank episode where the show's judges refused to fund the program's initial start-up.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 2017'nin sonlarına doğru Siminoff, alışveriş konulu televizyon kanalı QVC'ye çıktı.
mt: 2017's end, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ayrıca Ring, rakip güvenlik şirketi ADT Corporation ile aralarındaki davayı anlaşma yoluyla çözüme ulaştırmıştır.
mt: Ring also settled its lawsuit against rival security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Deneysel aşılardan birinin Ebola'nın öldürücülüğünü azalttığı görülse de, şu ana dek hiçbir ilacın var olan enfeksiyonu tedavi etmeye uygun olduğu açıkça kanıtlanamamıştır.
mt: 1 of the experimental vaccines has been shown to reduce the lethality of Ebola, but no drug has yet been shown to be effective in treating the existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Bir antikor karışımı olan Zmapp başlangıçta umut vadediyordu ancak resmi çalışmalar ölümleri önlemede istenilenden daha az faydalı olduğunu gösterdi.
mt: A cocktail of antibodies called Zmapp initially seemed promising, but official studies showed it was not as effective as hoped in preventing deaths.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM deneyinde ZMapp kontrol grubunda kullanıldı. Yani bilim adamları bu numuneyi referans aldı ve diğer üç tedaviyi bu numunenin verileriyle karşılaştırdı.
mt: ZMapp was used in the control group of the PALM trial. So the scientists used this sample as a reference and compared the other three treatments to it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: ABD Jimnastik Federasyonu, Birleşik Devletler Olimpiyat Komitesi'nin mektubunu destekler ve Olimpiyat ailesinin tüm sporcularımız için güvenli bir çevre oluşturulmasını desteklemeye mutlaka ihtiyaç olduğunu kabul eder.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Federation supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes that it is imperative that we create a safe environment for all of our athletes in the Olympic family.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: USOC'nin; lisans iptali yerine kurumumuzda mantıklı değişiklikler yapmaya devam ederek atletlerimizin, kulüplerimizin ve yaptıkları sporların çıkarlarına daha iyi hizmet edilebileceği yönündeki beyanına katılıyoruz.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that it will continue to make reasonable changes to our organization to better serve the interests of our athletes, clubs and sports rather than imposing a license revocation.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: ABD Jimnastik Federasyonu, Larry Nassar mağdurları tarafından böylesine cesur biçimde tasvir edilen orandaki bir istismarın nasıl bu kadar uzun süre tespit edilemediğine ışık tutabilecek bağımsız bir soruşturmanın yapılmasını destekler ve gereken ve uygun olan tüm değişiklikleri benimser.
mt: The U.S. Gymnastics Federation supports an independent investigation that will shed light on how such abuse could have gone undetected for so long, and will embrace any and all changes that are necessary and appropriate.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: ABD Jimnastik Federasyonu ve USOC aynı hedefe sahiptir — jimnastik sporunu ve diğerlerini atletlerin hayallerini güvenli, pozitif ve yetki sahibi oldukları bir ortamda gerçekleştirmeleri için olabildiğince güvenli kılmaktır.
mt: The U.S. Gymnastics Federation and USOC share the same goal — to make gymnastics and other sports as safe, positive and empowering as possible for athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 1960'lar boyunca Brzezinski, John F. Kennedy'nin danışmanı olarak ve sonra da Lyndon B. Johnson yönetimnde çalıştı.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and then worked in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 1976 seçimleri sırasında Carter'a dış politika konusunda danışmanlık yaptı, ardından 1977'den 1981'e kadar Henry Kissinger'ın halefi olarak Ulusal Güvenlik Danışmanı (NSA) görevini yaptı.
mt: 1976 elections, Carter served as an adviser to Carter on foreign policy, and then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: NSA olarak, 1978 Camp David Sözleşmesi; 1970'lerin sonlarında ABD-Çin ilişkilerinin normalleşmesi; 1979’daki İran rehine krizine yol açan İran Devrimi ve 1979’da Afganistan'ın Sovyetler tarafından işgali gibi dünya meselelerinin diplomatik olarak ele alınmasında Carter'a yardımcı oldu.
mt: 1978 Camp David Accords; the normalization of U.S.-China relations in the late 1970s; the Iranian hostage crisis that resulted from the Iranian Revolution in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979, among other world issues, were diplomatically handled by Carter with the help of NSA.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Ryan Gosling ve Emma Stone'un yer aldığı film, tüm ana kategorilerde aday gösterildi.
mt: 2017 Academy Awards nominees were announced on Tuesday, with La La Land leading the pack with 14 nominations.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling ve Stone sırasıyla En İyi Erkek ve Kadın Oyuncu ödüllerine aday gösterildiler.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Diğer adaylıklar En İyi Film, Yönetmen, Kostüm Tasarımı, Film düzenleme, Orijinal Müzik, Prodüksiyon Tasarımı, Ses Düzenleme, Ses Miksleme ve Orijinal Senaryoyu içeriyor.
mt: Other categories include Best Picture, Best Director, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Filmden iki şarkı, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ve City of Stars, en iyi orijinal şarkı için aday gösterildi. Lionsgate stüdyosu 26 adaylık aldı - ve bu diğer tüm stüdyolardan daha fazla.
mt: 2 songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations - and this is more than all other studios.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: ABD Başkanı Donald Trump, pazar günü akşam saatlerinde basın sekreteri aracılığıyla yaptığı açıklamada, ABD askerlerinin Suriye'den çekileceğini duyurdu.
mt: On Sunday evening, President Donald Trump announced through his press secretary that U.S. troops would be withdrawing from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Duyuru, Trump'ın Türkiye Cumhurbaşkanı Recep Tayyip Erdoğan ile yaptığı telefon görüşmesinden sonra yapıldı.
mt: The announcement was made after a phone call between Trump and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Türkiye, ele geçirilen İŞİD savaşçılarının korunmasını da üstenecektir, diye demeç verdi, ancak Avrupa ülkeleri onların geri gönderilmesini reddetti.
mt: Turkey will also take responsibility for the protection of captured ISIS fighters, he said, but European countries have rejected their return.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Bu sadece zaten hali hazırda olan bir teori olan en azından bazı dinozorların tüylerinin olduğunu doğrulamakla kalmıyor, aynı zamanda fosillerin genel olarak yapamayacağı, renk ve üç boyutlu düzenleme gibi ayrıntıları da sağlıyor.
mt: This not only confirms the theory that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, but also provides details such as color and three-dimensional arrangement that fossils could not.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Bilim insanları, bu hayvanın tüylerinin gövdenin alt kısmında soluk veya karotenoid renkli, üst kısmında ise kestane-kahverengi olduğunu söylüyor.
mt: Scientists say the animal's fur is light or carotenoid colored on the underside of its body and chestnut-brown on top.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Keşif aynı zamanda kuşlardaki tüylerin evrimi konusunda fikirler veriyor.
mt: The discovery also sheds light on the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Dinozor tüylerinde, kuş tüyü sapı adı verilen iyi gelişmiş bir sap olmadığı fakat çengeller ve çengelcikler gibi diğer tüy özellikleri bulunduğundan araştırmacılar, kuş tüyü sapının muhtemelen bu özelliklerden daha sonra ortaya çıkan bir evrimsel gelişme olduğu sonucuna vardı.
mt: Researchers concluded that the bird feather shaft, which is well-developed in bird feathers but not in dinosaur feathers, must have evolved after the other feather features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Tüylerin yapısı, uçuş amaçlı kullanılmadıklarını, daha ziyade sıcaklık düzenleme ve görüntü amaçlı kullanıldıklarını öne sürüyor. Araştırmacılar, bunun genç bir dinozorun kuyruğu olmasına rağmen numunenin yavru tüyü değil yetişkin tüyü gösterdiğini söylüyor.
mt: The study suggests the feathers were not used for flight, but for temperature regulation and display. The researchers say the specimen shows adult feathers, not juvenile feathers, despite being from a young dinosaur.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bunun genç bir dinozorun kuyruğu olmasına rağmen araştırmacılar, örneğin bir civciv tüyünü değil yetişkin tüylerini işaret ettiğini iddia etti.
mt: Researchers claim this is not a juvenile dinosaur tail, but an adult one, not a feather like a baby bird, but an adult one.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Dün sabah Türkiye’nin Gaziantep şehrinde emniyet müdürlüğünde patlayan bombalı araç, iki polis memurunun ölümüne ve yirmiden fazla kişinin yaralanmasına yol açtı.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and 20 people were injured when a car bomb exploded outside the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Valilik, yaralıların on dokuzunun polis olduğunu ifade etti.
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers, according to the governorate.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Polis, saldırıdan sorumlu olduğu iddia edilen bir Daeş (IŞİD) militanından şüphelendiklerini söyledi.
mt: Police said they suspected a Daesh (ISIS) militant of being responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Güneşin, diğer yıldızlar gibi temel prensiplerle hareket ettiğini keşfettiler: Sistemdeki bütün yıldızların etkinliklerinde, parlaklıklarından ve yörüngelerinden güç aldığını başka hiçbir şeyden güç almadıklarını keşfettiler.
mt: They discovered that the sun, like other stars, moves according to basic principles: that all the stars in the system derive their activity, brightness and orbits from nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Parlaklık ve dönme, bir yıldızın plazma akışıyla ilişkili Rossby sayısını belirlemek için birlikte kullanılır.
mt: Brightness and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of a star's plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Rossby sayısı ne kadar küçükse, yıldız manyetik tersinimlere nazaran o kadar az aktiftir.
mt: The lower the Rossby number, the less active the star is compared to magnetic reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Iwasaki, seyahati sırasında pek çok olayda başını belaya soktu.
mt: Iwasaki got into trouble many times during his travels.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Korsanlar tarafından soyuldu, Tibet'te kuduz bir köpek tarafından saldırıya uğradı, Nepal'de evlilikten kaçtı ve Hindistan'da tutuklandı.
mt: 1. Robbed by pirates, bitten by a rabid dog in Tibet, ran away from marriage in Nepal, and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n standardı, hem 2,4 Ghz hem de 5,0 Ghz frekanslarında çalışır.
mt: 802.11n standard works in both 2.4 Ghz and 5.0 Ghz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Bu da, baz istasyonunda çift telsiz olması halinde 802.11a, 802.11b ve 802.11g ile geriye dönük olarak uyumlu olmasına izin verecektir.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g will be backward compatible with this.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n'nin hızları, 600Mbit/s maksimum teorik iş hacmi üretimiyle öncekilerden önemli ölçüde daha hızlıdır.
mt: 802.11n's speeds are significantly faster than previous standards, with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: İki yetişkin çocukla evli olan Duvall, hikayenin ilişkili olduğu Miller üzerinde büyük bir intiba bırakmadı.
mt: 2 adult children and wife, Duvall did not leave a lasting impression on Miller.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Yorumu sorulduğunda Miller, "Mike duruşma sırasında çok konuşuyor... Ben hazırlanıyordum o yüzden ne dediğini tam olarak duyamadım," dedi.
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike was talking a lot during the hearing... I was getting ready so I didn't hear exactly what he said."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: Hu, "GSYİH birimi başına karbondioksit salınımlarını 2020'ye kadar 2005 seviyesine kıyasla önemli ölçüde azaltmak için çaba sarfedeceğiz," dedi.
mt: Hu said, "We will make significant efforts to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP to 2005 levels by 2020."
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Sınırlamalar için herhangi bir rakam belirtmedi ve sınırlamaların, Çin'in ekonomik üretim miktarına göre belirleneceğini söyledi.
mt: He did not give any figures for the restrictions and said they would be based on China's economic production capacity.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu, gelişmekte olan ülkeleri "önce kirletip sonra temizlemeye çalışma şeklindeki eski yöntemden kaçınmaya" teşvik etti.
mt: Hu urged developing countries to avoid the "old method of polluting first and cleaning up later."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Ayrıca, gelişme kademelerinin,mesuliyetlerinin ve kabiliyetlerinin ötesine geçen sorumlulukları üstlenmeleri istenmemelidir diye ekledi.
mt: He also added that they should not be asked to take on responsibilities that go beyond their development, accountability and capabilities.
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Irak Çalışma Grubu bildirisni bugün 12.00 GMT'de takdim etti.
mt: The Iraq Working Group delivered the report today at 12:00 GMT.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Bu noktada Irak'ta yapılacak eylemlerin; mezhep savaşlarını, artan şiddeti veya kaosa kayışı durduracağını kimsenin garanti edemeyeceği konusunda uyarıyor.
mt: At this point, no one can guarantee that the actions in Iraq will stop sectarian wars, increased violence or a slide into chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Rapor, Amerika Birleşik Devletleri'nde Ortadoğu'ya karşı politika hakkında açık bir müzakere ve bir uzlaşma istemiyle başlıyor.
mt: The report begins with an open call for a dialogue and a compromise on U.S. policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Rapor, Yönetimin Irak politikasının hemen hemen her yönünü yoğun bir şekilde eleştiriyor ve acilen bir yön değişikliği çağrısında bulunuyor.
mt: The report, which is highly critical of the government's Iraq policy in almost every respect, calls for an immediate policy shift.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: 78 önerisinden ilki, bu yılın sonuna kadar Irak'ın sınırlarının düşman müdahalesine karşı korunması ve komşularıyla diplomatik ilişkilerin yeniden kurulmasını sağlamak için yeni bir diplomatik inisiyatifin alınmasıdır.
mt: 78 of the proposals are to establish a new diplomatic initiative to protect Iraq's borders against hostile interference and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors by the end of this year.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Mevcut dönem Senatörü ve aynı zamanda Arjantin'in First Lady'si olan Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner dün akşam Buenos Aires'e 50 kilometre (31 mil) uzaklıktaki bir şehir olan La Plata'da başkanlığa aday olduğunu duyurdu.
mt: 50 kilometres (31 mi) away from Buenos Aires in the city of La Plata, current Senator and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced last night that she will run for presidency.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Bayan Kirchner, Buenos Aires ili delege heyetinin bir üyesi olarak senatoya yönelik 2005 yılı kampanyasını başlatırken kullandığı yer olan Arjantin Tiyatrosu'nda başkanlığa aday olmak istediğini açıkladı.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner, a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation to the senate, announced that she would run for president from the Argentine Theatre, where she launched her 2005 senate campaign.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Bazı sıkı maliye politikası savunucuları tarafından alaya alır bir şekilde "Bush's New Orleans Deal" (Bush'un New Orleans Anlaşması) olarak adlandırılan Katrina Kasırgası sonrası yardım ve yeniden inşa harcamaları ile ilgili anlaşmazlıklar tartışmayı alevlendirdi.
mt: 2005 Katrina Hurricane relief and reconstruction spending related disputes, dubbed "Bush's New Orleans Deal" by some tight-fisted fiscal policy advocates, fueled the debate.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Yeniden inşa çabasının liberal eleştirisi yeniden inşa sözleşmelerinin Washington içinden olarak algılanan kişilere verilmesine odaklandı.
mt: Critics of the reconstruction effort focused on the perceived favoritism of the reconstruction contracts to individuals from Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Dört milyonu aşkın insan cenazeye katılmak için Roma'ya gitti.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Orada bulunan insan sayısı o kadar fazlaydı ki herkesin St. Peter Meydanındaki cenazeye erişmesi mümkün değildi.
mt: There were so many people there that not everyone could get to the funeral at St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Halkın töreni izlemesini sağlamak için Roma'nın çeşitli yerlerine birkaç büyük televizyon ekranı kuruldu.
mt: Several large television screens were set up in various places in Rome to allow the public to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: İtalya'nın diğer pek çok kentinde ve dünyanın geri kalan kısmında, özellikle Polonya'da, Roma'dakilere benzeyen ve çok sayıda kişi tarafından izlenen dev ekranlar kuruldu.
mt: In other Italian cities and much of the rest of the world, especially Poland, large screens like those in Rome were erected and watched by many people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Tarihçiler, FBI'ın dairenin başarı yüzdesini artırmak için geçmişte uyguladığı, özellikle çalıntı araba vakaları olmak üzere kolay vakalara odaklanma politikasını eleştirdi.
mt: Historians criticized the FBI's policy of focusing on easy cases, such as stolen car incidents, to increase its success rate in the past, which the FBI also used.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongre, 2005 mali yılında müstehcenlik inisiyatifine fon sağlamaya başladı ve FBI'ın 10 yetkilisini yetişkin pornografisi alanına ayırması gerektiğini ifade etti.
mt: 2005 fiscal year, Congress began funding the initiative to provide adult pornography, and the FBI's 10 officials to allocate to the area.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: 11 dörtlük ve 2 altılık vurarak sadece 41 topta 70 run ile Robin Uthappa atışta en yüksek skoru elde etmiştir.
mt: 11 fours and 2 sixes, scoring 70 runs off 41 balls, Robin Uthappa achieved the highest score.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Orta sıra vurucuları, Sachin Tendulkar ve Rahul Dravid yüksek performans sergiledi ve birlikte yüz run yaptı.
mt: 2nd wicket keepers Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid put on a high performance and scored 200 runs together.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Fakat kaptanın kalesini kaybetmesinin ardından Hindistan sadece 36 puan alarak vuruş sırasını bitirebilmek için 7 kale kaybetti.
mt: However, after losing the captain's castle, India only scored 36 points to finish the match by losing 7 castles.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: ABD Başkanı George W. Bush 16 Kasım sabahı Singapur'a ulaştı ve bir haftalık Asya turuna başladı.
mt: 16 November morning, US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore and began a week-long Asian tour.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Singapur Başbakan Yardımcısı Wong Kan Seng tarafından karşılandı ve Singapur Başbakanı Lee Hsien Loong ile ticaret ve terörizm konularını görüştü.
mt: 2nd Minister of Singapore Wong Kan Seng was received and met with Singaporean Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong to discuss trade and terrorism.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Bush, ara dönem seçiminde yenilgiyle geçen haftanın ardından bir dinleyici kitlesine Asya'daki ticaretin genişletilmesinden bahsetti.
mt: Bush spoke to a group of listeners about expanding trade in Asia, after losing last week's midterm elections.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Başbakan Stephen Harper, PYO'da HSYH lideri Jack Layton ile Salı günkü 25 dakikalık toplantı sonrasında hükümetin 'Temiz Hava Yasasını' ikinci değerlendirmesinden önce bir daha gözden geçirilmek üzere tüm tarafların bulunduğu bir komiteye göndermeyi kabul etti.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's "Clean Air Act" back to a committee for further review before a second vote, after a 25-minute meeting with the leader of the New Democratic Party Jack Layton on Tuesday.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton, başbakan ile toplantı sırasında muhafazakarların çevre kanun teklifinde değişiklikler talep ederek Muhafazakar partinin çevre kanun teklifinin "kapsamlı ve bütüncül bir şekilde yeniden yazımını" istedi.
mt: Layton, during a meeting with the prime minister, asked the Conservative Party to "completely rewrite" its environment bill, which the Conservatives had proposed.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Federal Hükümet, Tazmanya Devonport'taki Mersey hastanesinin fonunu devralmak için devreye girdiğinden beri, eyalet hükümeti ve bazı federal parlamento üyeleri bunun, kasım ayına kadar gerçekleştirilecek olan federal seçimlerin başlangıcı için yapılan dikkat çekici bir gösteri olmasını eleştirdi.
mt: The federal government has intervened to take over funding for the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, since the state government and some federal parliamentarians have criticized the move as a provocative stunt to coincide with the federal election, which is scheduled to begin in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Fakat Başbakan John Howard bu yasanın amacının sadece fazladan 45 milyon Avustralya doları harcayarak, Tazmanya hükümetinin hastane tesislerinin kalitesini düşürmesini engellemek olduğunu söyledi.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the purpose of the law was to prevent the Tasmanian government from lowering the quality of its hospital facilities by spending an extra 45 million Australian dollars.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Son bültene göre, deniz seviyesi ölçümleri bir tsunami oluştuğunu gösterdi. Pago Pago ve Niue yakınlarında kaydedilen birtakım belirli tsunami faaliyetleri vardı.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level measurements showed a tsunami had occurred. There were some specific tsunami activities recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Tonga'da büyük bir hasar veya yaralanma bildirilmedi. Ancak elektrikler geçici olarak kesildi, bu da Tonga yetkililerinin PTWC tarafından yayınlanan tsunami uyarısını almasını engelledi.
mt: No major damage or injuries were reported in Tonga. However, the power was briefly cut, preventing Tongan officials from receiving the tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Hawaii'de, sahil şeridinde veya sahil şeridinin yakınında bulunan on dört okul, uyarıların kalkmasına rağmen tüm Çarşamba günü kapatıldı.
mt: 14 schools on or near the coast of Hawaii were closed all Wednesday after warnings were lifted.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: ABD Başkanı George W. Bush, açıklamayı olumlu karşıladı.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bush'un sözcüsü Gordon Johndroe Kuzey Kore'nin bu vaadini "Kore yarımadasında kanıtlanabilir nükleer silahsızlandırmayı sağlama yolunda büyük bir adım" olarak niteledi.
mt: Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe called this "a big step toward verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Atlantik Kasırga Mevsimi'nin isim verilen onuncu fırtınası olan Jerry Alt Tropik Fırtınası, bugün Atlantik Okyanusu'nda ortaya çıktı.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane Season, Tropical Storm Jerry, formed today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Ulusal Kasırga Merkezi (NHC), Jerry'nin bu noktada kara için herhangi bir tehdit teşkil etmediğini söylüyor.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says Jerry poses no threat to land at this point.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: ABD Mühendisler Birliği, 6 inçlik yağışın daha önce zarar gören setleri aşabileceğine ihtimal vermiştir.
mt: 6 inches of rain could exceed the capacity of the damaged system, the American Society of Civil Engineers has said.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Katrina Kasırgası sırasında 20 fit yüksekliğe kadar su basması yaşayan Dokuzuncu Koğuş, şu anda yakındaki su setinin aşılması nedeniyle bel hizasına kadar su içindedir.
mt: 9th Ward, which flooded up to 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is now under water up to its roofline due to the breach of a nearby levee.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Su 100 fit genişlikteki bir kesitten setin üzerine dökülüyor.
mt: 100 feet wide section of the runway is flooded.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Kamu Yöneticisi Adam Cuerden, geçtiğimiz ay Wikinews ile konuştuğunda silinmelerden dolayı duyduğu hüsranı ifade etti.
mt: Public servant Adam Cuerden, who spoke to Wikinews last month about his frustration with deletions, has died.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: O [Wales] bize en başından beri yalan söyledi. Önce bu, yasal nedenlerden kaynaklanıyormuş gibi davrandı, sonra da görsellerin silinmesine kadar bizi dinliyormuş gibi yaptı.
mt: He lied to us from the beginning. First he acted as if it was for legal reasons, then he pretended to listen to us until the pictures were deleted.
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Topluluğun rahatsız olması, milyonlarca açık lisanslı medyaya ev sahipliği yapan site için cinsel içeriğe dair bir politika taslağı hazırlama girişimleriyle sonuçlandı.
mt: 4chan's upset over the proposal, which was intended to set a policy for the site that hosts millions of open-licensed media, resulted in a draft policy for sexual content.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Yapılan iş genelde teorikti, fakat program Sagittarius galaksisine yönelik gözlemleri taklit etmek için yazılmıştı.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to mimic observations of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Ekibin aradığı etki, galaksinin karanlık maddesi ile Samanyolu'nun karanlık maddesi arasındaki gelgit güçlerinden kaynaklanacaktı.
mt: The team was looking for an effect that would come from the tides between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Tıpkı ayın dünyayı çekip gelgitlere sebep olması gibi, Samanyolu da Yay galaksisine bir kuvvet uygular.
mt: Just as the moon pulls the Earth and causes tides, the Milky Way exerts a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Bilim insanları, karanlık maddenin diğer karanlık maddeleri tıpkı normal madde gibi etkilediği sonucuna ulaşabildi.
mt: Scientists have been able to conclude that dark matter affects other dark matter the same way normal matter does.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Bu kuram, bir galaksinin çevresinde bulunan karanlık maddenin büyük bir kısmının galaksinin etrafında ışık halkasına benzer biçimde bulunduğunu ve çok sayıda ufak boyutta parçacıktan meydana geldiğini belirtiyor.
mt: This theory suggests that a large portion of dark matter around a galaxy is arranged in a ring-like structure around the galaxy, and is made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Televizyon haberleri santralden yükselen beyaz dumanı gösteriyor.
mt: Television news shows white smoke rising from the hangar.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Yerel merciler, tesisin etrafında oturanları kapalı mekanlarda durmaları, klimaları kapamaları ve çeşme suyu içmemeleri konusunda ikaz ediyor.
mt: Local markets are advising those living around the facility to stay indoors, close their air conditioning and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Japonya'nın nükleer ajansına göre, tesiste radyoaktif sezyum ve iyodin tespit edildi.
mt: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine were detected at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Yetkililer bunun, sahadaki uranyum yakıtı taşıyan konteynerlerin yırtılmış ve sızıntı yapıyor olabileceğinin göstergesi olduğunu tahmin ediyorlar.
mt: Officials believe this may be a sign that the containers on the scene containing uranium fuel are torn and leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll, İlaca Çok Dayanıklı Tüberküloz'u (XDR-TB) Güney Afrika'nın KwaZulu-Natal bölgesinde keşfetti.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal region.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Bir röportajda, yeni değişkenin "çok yüksek ölüm oranı nedeniyle, son derece rahatsız edici ve korkutucu" olduğunu söyledi.
mt: In an interview, the new mutation was described as "very alarming and frightening because of its very high mortality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Dr. Moll'a göre hastalardan bazılarına böcek hastanede bulaşmış olabilir ve en azından ikisi hastane sağlık çalışanıdır.
mt: Dr. Moll said some patients may have been infected by mosquitoes in the hospital and at least two are hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
